sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.CSQueryExtensionInstanceContentAccessOOB</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Implements extension point global.CSQueryExtensionPoint
Designed for CSM Granular Role configuration. Being called in CSQueryBRUtil to get all the role constants, including OOB role constants and user self customized role constants, to further process the access of these roles.</description>
        <name>CSQueryExtensionInstanceContentAccessOOB</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var CSQueryExtensionInstanceContentAccessOOB = Class.create();
CSQueryExtensionInstanceContentAccessOOB.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	
	getRolePermissionPool : function(){
		return CSQueryBRUtilOOBContentAccessConstants.ROLE_PERMISSIONS_POOL;
	},
	
	getRoleConditionPool : function(){
		return CSQueryBRUtilOOBContentAccessConstants.ROLE_CONDITIONS_POOL;
	},

    type: 'CSQueryExtensionInstanceContentAccessOOB'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-10-03 11:44:59</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>b34583d023433010766713d1d7bf65b4</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>CSQueryExtensionInstanceContentAccessOOB</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Customer Service Base Entities" source="com.snc.cs_base">4f2cce6b47664210cd4e1ce4316d43a4</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_b34583d023433010766713d1d7bf65b4</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-10-04 17:03:22</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
